sentences.en: Following the local industrialist on the appointments list is the physics laureate.
sentences.cn: 预约名单上排在本地实业家后面的是一位获奖物理学家.

sentences.en: He is a laureate of corruption, and his friends have introduced him at dinner parties as a writer of pornography.
sentences.cn: 他是腐败的桂冠作家，而他的朋友在吃饭的时候将他介绍成一个黄色作家。

sentences.en: He is the poet laureate of Arkansas.
sentences.cn: 他是阿肯色州的桂冠诗人.

sentences.en: He was a Nobel laureate in physics.
sentences.cn: 他是一位诺贝尔物理学奖获得者.

sentences.en: He was awarded the poet laureate by the queen.
sentences.cn: 他被女王封为桂冠诗人.

sentences.en: In addition to a Nobel laureate, Becker a recipient of the 2007 Presidential Medal of Freedom.
sentences.cn: 2007年, 贝克作为诺奖获得者接受了总统自由勋章.

sentences.en: Murphy and Nobel laureate Gary Becker and has defined economists'approaches to addiction ever since.
sentences.cn: 和诺贝尔经济学奖得主加里?贝克(GaryBecker)发表了《理性上瘾理论》(ATheoryofRationalAddiction)一书,自此定义了经济学家研究上瘾的方法.
尼日利亚的诺贝尔奖获得者沃莱·索因卡

sentences.en: Robert Bridges , English Poet Laureate , was born in Kent.
sentences.cn: 英国桂冠诗人 罗伯特·布里奇斯 生于肯特郡.

sentences.en: Robert Pinsky was the Poet Laureate a few years ago.
sentences.cn: 罗伯特是几年前的桂冠诗人.

sentences.en: She is the poet laureate of all lyricists.
sentences.cn: 她是所有抒情诗人中的桂冠诗人.

sentences.en: The nation's pediatrician laureate is preparing to lay down his black bag ( James Traub ).
sentences.cn: 全国最杰出的小儿科医生准备退休了 ( 詹姆斯·特劳布 ).

sentences.en: The nation's pediatrician laureate is preparing to lay down his black bag.
sentences.cn: 全国最杰出的小儿科医生准备退休了.

sentences.en: The physics laureate does not like that kind of uncertainty.
sentences.cn: 这位科学家不喜欢这种不确定性.

sentences.en: The poet laureate is expected to provide poems for great national occasions.
sentences.cn: 桂冠诗人要为重大的全国性事件赋诗.

sentences.en: VOICE: Who is the laureate you mentioned?
sentences.cn: 那谁是你提到的诺贝尔奖的获得人 呢 ?

sentences.en: When I first read thellos line by England's Poet Laureate, It'startled me.
sentences.cn: 熬头次读到英国桂冠骚人梅斯菲尔德的这行诗时, 我感应十分摇撼.

trans.tran_en: crowned with laurel leaves as a sign of honour
